name: @driflyte/mcp-server
description: Driflyte MCP server crawls, indexes and queries web & GitHub content for RAG-ready AI assistants.
long_description: The Driflyte MCP Server exposes tools that allow AI assistants to query and retrieve topic-specific knowledge from recursively crawled and indexed web pages. With this MCP server, Driflyte acts as a bridge between diverse, topic-aware content sources (web, GitHub, and more) and AI-powered reasoning, enabling richer, more accurate answers.

tools.name: list-topics
tools.description: Returns a list of topics for which resources (web pages, etc ...) have been crawled and content is available.

tools.name: search
tools.description: Given a list of topics and a user question, this tool retrieves the top-K most relevant documents from the crawled content.
